title: How to Draw a Ford Mustang

steps.headline: Gather all the necessary instruments like paper, pencil, pencil sharpener and eraser gum.
steps.description: For coloring, you can choose from colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors. Use quality paper so your color will come out nicely.

steps.headline: Draw a rectangle and a horizontal line.
Add a triangle and a rectangle.
Add two circles and few lines.
Inside the circles, draw two more circles.
steps.description: Add few more lines and one rectangle.

steps.headline: Add few more details and do some shading.
Draw a skinny trapezoid directly above the line.
steps.description: Above and to the right of this trapezoid, draw a triangle.

steps.headline: Below the horizontal line, add a circle.
steps.description: To the right of the circle, draw a shorter horizontal line.

steps.headline: Draw another circle on the right side of the short line.
steps.description: In front of that, draw a rectangle. Add another circle around each circle.

steps.headline: Draw an outline around the vehicle.
Color the drawing or add shading.

tyn: Colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors
text: Newer Style Gather all the necessary instruments like paper, pencil, pencil sharpener and eraser gum. For coloring, you can choose from colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors. Use quality paper so your color will come out nicely. Draw a rectangle and a horizontal line.  Add a triangle and a rectangle.  Draw three rectangles.  Add two circles and few lines.  Inside the circles, draw two more circles. Add few more lines and one rectangle. Add few more details and do some shading.  Erase the guidelines.  Start coloring.  Older Style Draw one horizontal guideline.  Draw a skinny trapezoid directly above the line. Above and to the right of this trapezoid, draw a triangle. Below the horizontal line, add a circle. To the right of the circle, draw a shorter horizontal line. Draw another circle on the right side of the short line. In front of that, draw a rectangle. Add another circle around each circle. Draw an outline around the vehicle.  Add detail and shading.  Erase unnecessary guidelines.  Color the drawing or add shading.
sentences: Newer Style Gather all the necessary instruments like paper, pencil, pencil sharpener and eraser gum.
For coloring, you can choose from colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors.
Use quality paper so your color will come out nicely.
Draw a rectangle and a horizontal line.
Add a triangle and a rectangle.
Draw three rectangles.
Add two circles and few lines.
Inside the circles, draw two more circles.
Add few more lines and one rectangle.
Add few more details and do some shading.
Erase the guidelines.
Start coloring.
Older Style Draw one horizontal guideline.
Draw a skinny trapezoid directly above the line.
Above and to the right of this trapezoid, draw a triangle.
Below the horizontal line, add a circle.
To the right of the circle, draw a shorter horizontal line.
Draw another circle on the right side of the short line.
In front of that, draw a rectangle.
Add another circle around each circle.
Draw an outline around the vehicle.
Add detail and shading.
Erase unnecessary guidelines.
Color the drawing or add shading.
